text:
You are analyzing the old v0-pre-rebuild implementation of the idea agents service.

Your task: Review the old implementation patterns (Task #2).

Working directory: /Users/georgewestbrook/Programming/novosapien/ns-content-workforce/ns-content-workforce-idea-agents

The old implementation is tagged as v0-pre-rebuild. Use git commands to access it:
- `git show v0-pre-rebuild` to view tag details
- `git show v0-pre-rebuild:src/...` to view specific files from that version

Focus on identifying:
- Agent architectures and team structures that worked well
- DSPy usage patterns
- Expert panel roles and scoring mechanisms
- Data models
- What should be preserved vs what needed improvement

When complete:
1. Update Task #2 to "completed" status
2. Send a message to team-lead with your findings about patterns worth preserving
